Class ElasticsearchSchemaAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.schema.impl.ElasticsearchSchemaAccessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, Startable, Stoppable

    public class ElasticsearchSchemaAccessor
extends Object
implements Service, Startable, Stoppable
    A utility implementing primitives for the various DefaultElasticsearchSchema*.

    Gunnar Morling, Yoann Rodiere
